beschrijving: Een webshop waarin je als admin accounts als seller kan benoemen zodat ze producten kunnen toevoegen en spullen kunnen kopen.

Conway's Game of Life is a grid-based simulation where cells live or die based on simple rules. Each cell's state (alive or dead) in the next generation depends on its neighbors: live cells survive with 2-3 neighbors, die with fewer (underpopulation) or more (overpopulation), and dead cells come to life with exactly 3 neighbors. These rules create complex, evolving patterns over time.
a game about snakes with a trail that if you hit you die. each player has power ups you can choose from.

titel: World of Argon: The Attack of Virex
beschrijving: World of Argon: The Attack of Virex is a game where you have to defeat the evil Virex. The game has 3 area's, each with its own unique enemies and bosses. The game is made in Unreal Engine.
